title: Vidal Sassoon Cherry Almond Classic Clean Shampoo, 12.9 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 6)
description: For carefree hair with time to spare start your day with Aussie Total Miracle Collection 7N1 Shampoo. Packed with 7 benefits in 1 bottle it starts by cleansing your tresses to reveal brilliant natural shine. The moisture-enriched serum infusion protects your hair from dryness split ends and breakage. On top of that this miraculous shampoo makes your hair more manageable by detangling your strands. The result? Your hair is less prone to damage and breakage. Follow with Aussie Total Miracle Collection 7N1 Conditioner and emerge from the shower with a head full of silky smooth hair. Because around here we make Aussome hair easy!
